lead_paragraph: Bob Krapenc, a lawyer fired by Maurice Clarett, said yesterday that an assistant prosecutor offered a plea deal in July with a sentence as short as a year and a half if Clarett admitted a felony robbery charge.
snippet: Bob Krapenc, a lawyer fired by Maurice Clarett, said yesterday that an assistant prosecutor offered a plea deal in July with a sentence as short as a year and a half if Clarett admitted a felony robbery charge.
